Title: 8.14. JSON Types
Description:
Stores JSON data as text, preserving the original formatting, including:

Whitespace

Key order

Duplicate keys

Parsing happens each time the value is processed.

Good when you need to preserve the exact input.

Title: 8.14. JSON Types
Description:
Stores JSON in a decomposed binary format.

Automatically:

Removes whitespace

Orders object keys

Removes duplicate keys (keeps the last)

Supports indexing (GIN, BTREE) and is more efficient for querying.

Recommended for most use cases.
